title: Matthew Jarvis (rugby union)
text:
Mathew Jarvis (born 25 August 1990) is a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player for <a href="Connacht%20Rugby">Connacht Rugby</a>. His favoured position is out-half. Jarvis signed for Connacht from the <a href="Welsh%20Rugby%20Union">Welsh Rugby Union</a> team the <a href="Ospreys%20%28rugby%20union%29">Ospreys</a>.
Honours.
Jarvis has played for the <a href="Wales">Welsh</a> U-18 and U-20 teams.
